articles.title: D6 Geo Database
articles.description: This webpage provides a quick look-up source for geospatial data available for studies at the IZW Department of Ecological Dynamics.
articles.contents:
germany
distance to roads (2022)

berlin
motorways (2022)
Contact
Department Lead: Prof. Dr. S. Kramer-Schadt
Deputy Lead: Dr. Andreas Wilting
Geo Data Manager: Moritz Wenzler-Meya
wenzler[at]izw-berlin.de
Address
Leibniz Institute for Zoo and Wildlife Research
Department of Ecological Dynamics
Alfred-Kowalke-Str. 17
D-10315 Berlin, Germany
